title: Afternoon Hydration Dip
description: Your hydration tends to drop significantly between 2-4 PM. This could affect your energy levels and overall daily goal achievement.

title: Caffeine Balance Opportunity
description: Your caffeine intake peaks at 380mg on days when water intake is below average. Balancing caffeine with extra hydration could optimize your energy levels.
action_items: Add 200ml water for every coffee consumed
Switch to decaf options after 2 PM
Monitor how caffeine affects your hydration goals
